TextBody:
Hi Don,

As requested I have sent the invite for Tuesday from 10:30am CDT.

Please find the Zoom meeting link below:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/87312419928?pwd=qUk28gPia0a1RPcZook2AkMQcaBcpn.1

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 3/8/2025 12:20 AM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Would you have some availability Tuesday at 10:30am central time? 
 

Thanks,

Don

 


On Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 7:48 AM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Don,

Happy to hear that the license issue was finalized.

Please let me know if you have availability next week for a remote session so we can take a look over the remaining computers that have the issue. We would need access to one of the computers experiencing the issue in order to better investigate it.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 3/7/2025 1:05 AM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Good afternoon Flaviu,
 

We were able to get the license count up to account for those devices not receiving the deployment. We are still noticing that some of the endpoints are struggling to receive the deployment even with extra licenses. Were you able to figure out any additional potential troubleshooting steps that we can take?

 


On Thu, Mar 6, 2025 at 12:58?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Don,

Please let me know if the license count has been increased and also if there are any issues after that was finalized.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Netwrix Support [techsupport@netwrix.com]
Sent: 2/18/2025 10:58 PM
To: don.stewart@amount.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

Hi Don,

I have checked internally and I have asked my colleague Nadine to reach out to you regarding the license request.

Please let me know if there are any issues after that is finalized.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 2/15/2025 12:58 AM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Thanks Emil, I hope you have a good weekend. 
 


On Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 4:47?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Don,

Sure, I will get in touch with Sara and I will tell her about your request.

Best regards,
Emil


--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 2/15/2025 12:24 AM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Thanks Emil, this is insightful! 
 

Would you be able to escalate to our account rep? I sent an email out, and I believe that rep would be Sara Hall for us, not sure if you are able to confirm this. 

 


On Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 4:19?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Don,

Unfortunately, I can not help you with the additional licenses.

In order to identify if this could be the issue please check if the amount of used licensed is equal with the total number of licenses. You can access System Configuration -> System licensing for this.


If all the licenses are being used, I would recommend to enable the automatic license release for the computers which did not communicate with the server for a specific amount of time.
You can enable it from System Configuration -> System Licensing -> View Licenses -> scroll down to the bottom of the page -> Automatic license release -> enable the feature.

In the example below, all the computers which did not check in with the EPP Server for 30 days will have the licenses released automatically.


Let me know if this helps.

Thank you,
Emil


--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 2/15/2025 12:03 AM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Emil,
 

Would you all be able to provide some extra licensing to see if that is indeed the issue here? We would be happy to discuss paying for those licenses, but in the past we were told that there wouldn't be a stop limit for our licenses if we went over, and that if any additional devices past that limit occurs we can discuss what the payment plan would look like. This is a huge blocker for my team, and not something that we were aware of previously. 

 


On Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 3:58?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Don,

As I can see, the configuration looks correct.
Please check how many licenses are currently in use, by accessing System Configuration -> System Licensing.
If all the licenses are used, then the new computers will not able to register.

Let me know if you still have available licenses and the computers are not able to communicate with the server.

Thank you,
Emil

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 2/14/2025 11:51 PM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Cc: paul.tzirides@amount.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Hey Emil, 
 

So it looks like that is the right address, from checking my settings compared to the devices that we are attempting to connect to. The user we are working with receives the icon when we push the agent, but it is showing as not connected when we run that command in the settings. The device shows up in the console as offline and unlicensed after this and does not progress. 



 


On Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 3:32?PM Don Stewart <don.stewart@amount.com> wrote:


Hey Emil,
 

We have an on-prem console, we are using https://aj8f11f.hosted.endpointprotector.com:443 in lieu of an IP for the agent to communicate with the server. Should we be inputting something else for this and where would I find that? 

 


On Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 3:16?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Don,

If you have access to the computer where the EPP Client was installed, please open the EPP Client on the machine -> click on the settings tab -> press command+option+i on your keyboard and check if the EPP Client is using the correct IP in order to communicate with the server.

If the server's IP is not set then you will have to edit the POST Install JAMF Script and configure it with your server's IP. Then make sure that the post install script is also included in the package and try to reinstall the EPP Client.
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_files/epp_change_ip_epp_run.zip


Thank you,
Emil


--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Don Stewart [don.stewart@amount.com]
Sent: 2/14/2025 8:41 PM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #435669 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref - [EXTERNAL] Need appropriate script and package for EPP MDM deployments [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LoUJm:ref
 
Here is an example from our console. The engineer pushed an uninstall from the mdm yesterday. It was removed from the machine but still showing up like this in the console. He is now attempting to re-deploy the install from the mdm but we are still seeing the device show up as such. 


 


On Thu, Feb 13, 2025 at 5:36?PM Don Stewart <don.stewart@amount.com> wrote:


And to follow up to my last question. How can I go about setting up with a call with an engineer to talk with myself and our IT team through some of the issues that we are encountering?
 


On Thu, Feb 13, 2025 at 5:32?PM Don Stewart <don.stewart@amount.com> wrote:


Hi Flaviu, 
 

I appreciate you sending that over so fast! I did have another question. How long does it take for the console to recognize an agent uninstalling or installing before it shows in the console? We are attempting to test uninstalling from the mdm, and reinstalling as we have noticed that has worked with some other devices. 

 


On Wed, Feb 12, 2025 at 5:08?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Don,

We hope you are doing well.

We have documentation for JAMF and Intune MDM deployment tools:
JAMF: https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_JAMF_Deployment_User_Manual_EN.pdf
Intune: https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_Intune_Deployment_Guide_EN.pdf

Please also find below the PRE and POST install scripts:
POST install jamf script: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_files/epp_change_ip_epp_run.zip
PRE install jamf script: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_files/epp_change_ip_preinstall.sh.zip

Please let me know if there is any other information that we can provide.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

 

ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0LoUJm:ref



 

 
-- 






 

Don Stewart|Security Operations Manager

Amount.com | 222 N LaSalle St., Suite 1700 | Chicago, IL 60601


don.stewart@amount.com

Thank you for the remote session!

As we spoke the issue seems to be resolved now and the EPP clients seem to be online, licensed and communicating with the server.

We are closing this ticket.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
